text: Investigação Criminal (English: Criminal Investigation) is a Brazilian true crime documentary television series that follows testimonials from police investigations of some of Brazil's most shocking crimes. ==Episodes== === Season 1 (2012) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin-right:0;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| No. ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Directed by |- |} === Season 2 (2013) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin-right:0;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| No. ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Directed by |- |} === Season 3 (2014) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin-right:0;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| No. ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Directed by |- |} === Season 4 (2015) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin-right:0;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| No. ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Directed by |- |} === Season 5 (2016) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin-right:0;" |- ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| No. ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background:#333333; color:#fff;"| Directed by |- |} ==Release== Investigação Criminal began airing on December 4, 2012, on A&E; in Brazil. On 2018, the series has been licensed to Netflix. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2012 Brazilian television series debuts Category:2010s Brazilian documentary television series Category:Brazilian crime television series Category:Brazilian documentary television series Category:Portuguese- language television shows Category:True crime television series
